root.title: daewoo motor boost import u. good
root.body: daewoo motor corp korea-bas joint ventur daewoo group gener motor corp gm say boost 1987 import u. good 200 mln dlr 104 mln dlr 1986 compani say u. import account 35 pct total plan import 565 mln dlr 1987 last year u. good account 19 pct compani import 6.5 pct 1985 product slate import includ automobil machineri part catalyt convert fuel inject system electron emiss test system say
